header.title: Love Potion (Pandemic Serum)
header.tagline: Love Without Boundaries – A Serum that Captivates Hearts

overview.title: Overview
overview.text: The Love Potion is a revolutionary serum originally designed to make Morty's crush fall madly in love with him. However, it inadvertently spreads worldwide, creating a global phenomenon of forced affection and chaotic relationships. While it promises the allure of love, it raises ethical questions about consent and the nature of genuine connections.

team.title: Agents
team.text: The dedicated team of biochemists and sociologists worked tirelessly to refine the Love Potion's formula while managing its unintended consequences.

problem.title: Problem
problem.text: Many individuals struggle to connect with potential partners, leading to loneliness and unreciprocated feelings. The desire to foster romantic relationships can drive people to seek unconventional solutions.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: The Love Potion offers a temporary solution to the challenge of attraction by enhancing the pheromonal appeal and emotional response in the target individual. However, its widespread release leads to unexpected romantic chaos.

list.name: Pheromone Enhancement
list.description: The serum amplifies natural pheromone production, making the user irresistible to their crush.

list.name: Emotional Amplification
list.description: Increases emotional responsiveness and attraction, creating a heightened sense of infatuation.

list.name: Rapid Onset Effect
list.description: The serum's effects manifest quickly, often within minutes, ensuring immediate results.

list.name: Short-lived Influence
list.description: While the effects can be intense, they are designed to wear off after a limited time, promoting the idea of natural relationships.

list.name: Global Release Mechanism
list.description: The unintended release mechanism enables the serum to spread rapidly across populations, leading to widespread affection.

useCases.title: Unrequited Love
useCases.description: Individuals seeking to ignite a spark with a crush may use the serum to stimulate romantic feelings.

useCases.title: Romantic Events
useCases.description: At weddings or romantic gatherings, the serum can create an atmosphere of love and connection, albeit artificially.

useCases.title: Social Experiments
useCases.description: Researchers can utilize the serum in controlled studies to understand the effects of attraction and pheromones on human behavior.

useCases.title: Marketing Stunts
useCases.description: Brands might use the serum in campaigns to generate buzz around their products, leveraging the allure of love.

future.title: The Future of Love Potion Technology
future.text: Future iterations of the Love Potion could focus on refining its formula to ensure consent and genuine connections, potentially leading to a more ethical approach to fostering relationships while addressing the complexities of human emotion.
